Uses of Package
org.barghos.core.color.api

  • Packages that use org.barghos.core.color.api 
    Package Description
    org.barghos.core.color
    This package contains all basic implementations of LDR/HDR RGB/RGBA colors.
    org.barghos.core.color.api  
  • Classes in org.barghos.core.color.api used by org.barghos.core.color 
    Class and Description
    IColor3R
    This interface grants access to all reading methods of an RGB-Color.
    IColor3W
    This interface grants access to all writing methods of an RGB-Color.
    IColor4R
    This interface grants access to all reading methods of an RGBA-Color.
    IColor4W
    This interface grants access to all writing methods of an RGBA-Color.
    IHDRColor3R
    This interface allows for selective reading of only HDR-RGB-Colors.
    IHDRColor3W
    This interface allows for selective writing of only HDR-RGB-Colors.
    IHDRColor4R
    This interface allows for selective reading of only HDR-RGBA-Colors.
    IHDRColor4W
    This interface allows for selective writing of only HDR-RGBA-Colors.
    ILDRColor3R
    This interface allows for selective reading of only LDR-RGB-Colors.
    ILDRColor3W
    This interface allows for selective writing of only LDR-RGB-Colors.
    ILDRColor4R
    This interface allows for selective reading of only LDR-RGBA-Colors.
    ILDRColor4W
    This interface allows for selective writing of only LDR-RGBA-Colors.
